actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit individual retirement accounts to be used as security for loans.

summary.text: Repeals the provision of the Internal Revenue Code which treats as a distribution to the beneficiary any portion of an individual retirement account (IRA) that is used as security for a loan (thus permitting tax-free use of an IRA as such security).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit individual retirement accounts to be used as security for loans.
